author: ditshej

comments.body:
I came here to report the same thing for version `v0.8.4` on Windows 10
* Either Alt+Tab or Windows key to get out of the game screen in fullscreen causes the screen to freeze upon reentering. Game inputs are actually working but the rendering is frozen.

**Fix:**
This seems to be caused by the `DisableScreensaver` flag, try turning that off:
`DisableScreensaver = false`
Wow, thanks @kjerk, that fixed it for me too.

title: No Longer Able To Move Mouse Cursor To 2nd Monitor
body:
9/22/24
I play with a Dual Sense controller for this game on PC

0.7.9 was the last update where you were able to move your mouse cursor over to your monitor.

Updated to 0.8.1 and can no longer move mouse cursor.

I switched to borderless, hit windows key and was able to move it over. Switch it back to fullscreen and no issues. Mouse cursor stayed on 2nd monitor while I gamed on primary monitor with Dual Sense.

*UPDATE - 9/23/24
Today same thing happened again, repeated same solution, HOWEVER, as soon as I start playing with controller, mouse cursor is moved back to primary monitor.
author: RAWZeroG

comments.body: Set "LockCursor = false" in `FFXVIFix.ini`. It's enabled by default so that borderless mouse behaviour matches windowed.
@Lyall How silly of me not to think, I appreciate you and thank you so much!
